description: The AP-02 Regional Transport Office serves the Anantapuramu district in Andhra Pradesh. Although the state transitioned to a unified AP-39 registration series in 2019, this office continues to manage legacy registrations and regional transport services for the Anantapur area.
address: Regional Transport Office, Bhairava Nagar, Near JNTU Engineering College, Anantapur, Andhra Pradesh
